content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Be the last Champion standing in Realm Royale! Choose a class, then loot deadly weapons and powerful abilities to create your own Champion. Explore a fantasy world from horseback, and craft game-changing legendary gear. Can you survive the first 100-person fantasy Battle Royale?

Get instant access to Realm Royale on PlayStation®4 with the Founder’s Pack! Plus, you’ll get our first cosmetic bundle, full of PS4™-exclusive content! Get a new mount skin, a chicken skin, and much more!

This bundle will only be available for a limited time. Don't miss out!

The Founder’s Pack includes:

Immediate access to the Closed Beta
Primarch Chicken Skin
Primarch Mustang
Primarch Avatar
Primarch Spray
Gracious Bow Emote

Remote Play requires PS Vita system and sufficiently robust Wi-Fi connection.

Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).


1 player
Network Players 2-99
5GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
Online Play (Required)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

© 2018 Hi-Rez Studios, Inc. All rights reserved. “Realm Royale” and “Hi-Rez Studios” are trademarks or registered trademarks of Hi-Rez Studios, Inc. in the U.S. and/or other countries. All other trademarks are property of their respective owners.
